Package camzup.core

Interface ISvgWritable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Curve2, CurveEntity2, ImageEntity2, Mesh2, MeshEntity2, TextEntity2
public interface ISvgWritable
Maintains consistent behavior between classes which support creation of an SVG file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static float DEFAULT_SVG_HEIGHT
    Default height of an SVG view box.
    static float DEFAULT_SVG_WIDTH
    Default width of an SVG view box.
    static float DEFAULT_SVG_X_ORIGIN
    Default origin x of a 'camera' transform in an SVG.
    static float DEFAULT_SVG_Y_ORIGIN
    Default origin y of a 'camera' transform in an SVG.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default java.lang.String toSvgElm()
    Renders the curve as a string containing an SVG element.
    default java.lang.String toSvgElm​(java.lang.String id)
    Renders the curve as a string containing an SVG element.
    java.lang.String toSvgElm​(java.lang.String id, float zoom)
    Renders the curve as a string containing an SVG element.

    Stroke weight is impacted by scaling in transforms, so zoom is a parameter.
    default java.lang.String toSvgString()
    Renders this object as an SVG string.
    default java.lang.String toSvgString​(java.lang.String id, float xOrigin, float yOrigin, float width, float height)
    Renders this object as an SVG string.
    default java.lang.String toSvgString​(java.lang.String id, Vec2 origin, Vec2 dim)
    Renders this curve as an SVG string.

  • Method Details

    • toSvgElm

      default java.lang.String toSvgElm()
      Renders the curve as a string containing an SVG element.
      Returns:
      the SVG string

    • toSvgElm

      default java.lang.String toSvgElm​(java.lang.String id)
      Renders the curve as a string containing an SVG element.
      Parameters:
      id - the path id
      Returns:
      the SVG string

    • toSvgElm

      java.lang.String toSvgElm​(java.lang.String id, float zoom)
      Renders the curve as a string containing an SVG element.

      Stroke weight is impacted by scaling in transforms, so zoom is a parameter. If nonuniform zooming is used, zoom can be an average of width and height or the maximum dimension.
      Parameters:
      id - the path id
      zoom - scaling from external transforms
      Returns:
      the SVG string

    • toSvgString

      default java.lang.String toSvgString()
      Renders this object as an SVG string. A default material renders the mesh's fill and stroke. The background of the SVG is transparent.
      Returns:
      the SVG string

    • toSvgString

      default java.lang.String toSvgString​(java.lang.String id, float xOrigin, float yOrigin, float width, float height)
      Renders this object as an SVG string. A default material renders the mesh's fill and stroke. The background of the SVG is transparent. The width and height inform the view box dimensions. The origin is expected to be in unit coordinates, [0.0, 1.0] ; it is multiplied by the view box dimensions. The camera scale is set to the shorter edge of the view box, so as to contain the shape.
      Parameters:
      id - the element id
      xOrigin - the origin x
      yOrigin - the origin y
      width - the width
      height - the height
      Returns:
      the SVG string

    • toSvgString

      default java.lang.String toSvgString​(java.lang.String id, Vec2 origin, Vec2 dim)
      Renders this curve as an SVG string. A default material renders the mesh's fill and stroke. The background of the SVG is transparent. The width and height supplied form both the view box dimensions, the translation and the scale of the shape.
      Parameters:
      id - the element id
      origin - the origin
      dim - the dimensions
      Returns:
      the SVG string
